definitions: lack of strong emotions, features, or characteristics

examples.text: the overall blandness of his performance

shortDefinitions: lack of strong emotions, features, or characteristics

definitions: (with reference to food or drink) the quality of being unseasoned, mild-tasting, or insipid

examples.text: the boneless chops were underseasoned to the point of blandness

shortDefinitions: quality of being unseasoned, mild-tasting, or insipid
